org.guicebox
Class PropertiesModule

java.lang.Object
  com.google.inject.AbstractModule
      org.guicebox.PropertiesModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.inject.Module
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommandLineModule
public class PropertiesModule
extends com.google.inject.AbstractModule

Binds both explicit BindingAnnotations and Named annotations to constant values supplied in the environment via properties files.

Any and all properties files in the relative paths properties/ and/or properties/username/ (where username is the login ID of the current user) will be read, and the key-value pairs mapped as Guice constants.

Values are given precedence in the following order:

  1. supplied in properties/username/*.properties
  2. supplied in properties/*.properties
  3. default value, when using Inject(optional=true)

Author:
willhains

Method Detail

setConstant

protected final void setConstant(java.lang.String key,
                                 java.lang.String value)
Sets the value of the specified constant. Constant values may be set multiple times, and the last value set when Guice configures the module will be used by the application.

Parameters:
key - the name of the constant - may be either the FQN of a BindingAnnotation or a simple name.
value - the value of the constant.

getConstant

protected final java.lang.String getConstant(java.lang.String key)
Returns:
the value of the specified key.

configure

protected final void configure()
Loads the collected constant values into Guice.

configure in class com.google.inject.AbstractModule
